trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to uniquely identify a manifest-activated application.
trans-unit.target: 提供唯一識別由資訊清單啟動的應用程式的能力。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity> class is used in the activation of manifest-based applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity>類別用來啟用的資訊清單為基礎的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of an <xref:System.ActivationContext> object to obtain the <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity> for a manifest-based application.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ActivationContext>物件取得<xref:System.ApplicationIdentity>資訊清單為基礎的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.ActivationContext> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.ActivationContext>類別。

trans-unit.source: The full name of the application.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ApplicationIdentity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ApplicationIdentity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The format of the `applicationIdentityFullName` parameter is a comma-delimited Unicode string that begins with the name, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 格式`applicationIdentityFullName`參數是以逗號分隔的 Unicode 字串，名稱開頭，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Where *deploymentIdentity* =
trans-unit.target: 其中*deploymentIdentity* =

trans-unit.source: And *applicationIdentity* =
trans-unit.target: 和*applicationIdentity* =

trans-unit.source: The following is an example of the full name for an application named ActivationContext:
trans-unit.target: 名為 ActivationContext 的應用程式的完整名稱的範例如下：

trans-unit.source: The default value for processor architecture is "msil", and the default value for type is "win32".
trans-unit.target: 處理器架構的預設值為"msil"，和類型的預設值為"win32"。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="applicationIdentityFullName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="applicationIdentityFullName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the deployment manifest as a URL.
trans-unit.target: 取得部署資訊清單 URL 的位置。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: 部署資訊清單的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The following are two examples of <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity.CodeBase%2A> property values for an application named ActivationContext:
trans-unit.target: 下列兩個範例說明<xref:System.ApplicationIdentity.CodeBase%2A>名為 ActivationContext 的應用程式的屬性值：

trans-unit.source: file://C:/UserFiles/UserName/SolutionName/ActivationContext/publish/ActivationContext.application.
trans-unit.target: file://C:/UserFiles/UserName/SolutionName/ActivationContext/publish/ActivationContext.application.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of an <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity> object to obtain the value of the <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity.CodeBase%2A> property for a manifest-based application.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ApplicationIdentity>要取得之值物件<xref:System.ApplicationIdentity.CodeBase%2A>資訊清單為基礎的應用程式的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.ActivationContext> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.ActivationContext>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the full name of the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: The full name of the application, also known as the display name.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的完整名稱，也稱為顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: For a description of the format of the <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity.FullName%2A> property, see the <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需格式的說明<xref:System.ApplicationIdentity.FullName%2A>屬性，請參閱<xref:System.ApplicationIdentity.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of an <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity> object to obtain the value of the <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity.FullName%2A> property for a manifest-based application.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ApplicationIdentity>要取得之值物件<xref:System.ApplicationIdentity.FullName%2A>資訊清單為基礎的應用程式的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.ActivationContext> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.ActivationContext>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: 要以資料填入的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />) structure for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: 序列化的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: 將序列化目標物件所需要的資料填入 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full name of the manifest-activated application.
trans-unit.target: 傳回資訊清單啟動的應用程式完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: The full name of the manifest-activated application.
trans-unit.target: 資訊清單啟動的應用程式完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: For a description of the format of a full name for a manifest activated application, see the <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需的資訊清單啟動的應用程式的完整名稱的格式說明，請參閱<xref:System.ApplicationIdentity.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。
